EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying the manager when account creation is completed

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the workflow.

Argument.name: refIdentityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that is registering.

Argument.name: recipientDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is registering.

Argument.name: provisioningErrors
Argument.Description: Any provisioning errors that may have occurred.

EmailTemplate.Subject: User '$refIdentityDisplayName' has been onboarded.
